summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1978, for the improvement of First Avenue Northwest, from North Sixtieth Street to West Fifty-eighth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for all necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 20383, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
